Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • MapEntity
      • Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Character
extends MapEntity
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    Implements the player's avatar.
